title: Compare declines of Spain and Dutch 17th c

content.question:
Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.
Compare and contrast the economic factors responsible for the decline of Spain with the economic factors responsible for the decline of the Dutch Republic by the end of the seventeenth century.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
